verses.verse: A Psalm of an Ode for the sons of Kore. On the holy mountains are his foundations!
The Lord loveth the gates of Sion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
Glorious things have been said of thee, city of God.
Shall I mention Rahab or Babylon to those gaining a knowledge of me? Behold the Philistines and Tyrians, and the tribe of the Ethiopians say, Such and such were born there.
Man will say, “Sion is my mother;” and, “In it such a man was born.” “The Most High himself founded it”
this will be the account which the Lord will give in the enrollment of peoples and of those chiefs who were born in it.
How delighted must all be; whose habitation is in thee!
